articles.title: Where to get a COVID-19 vaccine in Northeast Florida - WJXT News4JAX
articles.description: Access to COVID-19 vaccines expanded considerably March 3 when Northeast Florida’s largest vaccine site opened at Gateway Mall and the state expanded its criteria for who can get the shots.
